title: Bug 121170 - get column label from metadata object should return user recognizable strings
description: The current implementation of IMetaData.getColumnLabel() does not return user recognizable strings.
OB: When calling IMetaData.getColumnLabel() before or after data extraction, the returned value is not a user recognizable string.
EB: The IMetaData.getColumnLabel() method should return a user recognizable string, both before and after data extraction.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create an instance of IMetaData.
2. Call IMetaData.getColumnLabel() before data extraction.
3. Extract the data.
4. Call IMetaData.getColumnLabel() again after data extraction.
5. Verify that the returned values are user recognizable strings in both cases.
